desc: Unique quilting and sewing patterns created by designer Lesley Chaisson. All patterns include full size templates, and digital images to help with construction. Wholesale orders welcome!

layout.text:
Thank you for your interest in carrying Berry Birdy patterns in your shop! All patterns include detailed step-by-step instructions with full-colour, digital diagrams.
Fabric requirements for all sizes are listed on the back for easy in-store reference. Patterns are professionally printed as a 5.5" x 8.5" booklet on high quality matte paper. Each is enclosed in a clear resealable bag with a hole for hanging.
Minimum $200.00 order required with FREE shipping worldwide.
